title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
eahouse

NOTE: Not tested for all companions. Party of Gale/Karlack/Shadowheart only gave approval to Gale.

Receive Mayrina's Locket

You need to let Mayrina know Ethel killed her brothers. This can only be triggered the first time you encounter Mayrina when Ethel is forcing her to eat Hag Food. When you kill Ethel / Ask Ethel to save Mayrina at the Overgrown Tunnel, you can talk to her after the battle and pick the Third Option when she wants to give you something

Sunlit Wetlands - Auntie Eth
